faqs.question: Will you hate me if I don't come to the wedding?
faqs.answer: Not at all! We completely understand - it's not an easy trip. We'll miss you, but we'll still love you just the same ❤️

faqs.question: How do we RSVP?
faqs.answer: Please tell us if you're coming!

faqs.question: What should we expect from the food?
faqs.answer: There will be vegetarian food and non-alcoholic drinks for the meals during the wedding days.

faqs.question: Is there a dress code for the events?
faqs.answer: We want you to feel free to dress up as you would like! Generally Indian weddings see women in colourful outfits, flowy fabrics, and jewellery. Men tend to dress similarly to the west, but more patterns and colour. We will share ideas for inspiration soon!

faqs.question: How can I follow wedding planning updates and connect with other guests?
faqs.answer: Join our WhatsApp group to connect with other guests, coordinate travel plans, and stay updated with all wedding information! Click here to join

faqs.question: Where else should I travel when I am in India?
faqs.answer: We'd love to help you plan your trip. Get in touch! We will soon share our recommendations on the website as well.
